phrases: They decided to serialize my manga!
Thank you, getting serialized feels great!
I will do my best to catch up with you!
I think he is declared war...
Let us do our best to beat them!
Hey, if I could be with you right now
Then I could keep my voice from fading
The goals I have set for myself seem too high to reach,
and I feel like I have lost my way
I am relying on a broken compass and hiding in someone is shadow
If we keep letting go of what we have to find something else,
then I am convinced we can never grow up
Just as Kiyoshi Knight is ending we have a new serialization.
Yeah, it is about motorsports in a way...
Hattori-san does not look too happy.
He says PCP in 6th place will not cut it.
Are you even listening to me?
Please take this a little more seriously!
I definitely will not lose to Ashirogi Muto.
In 6 months, PCP will probably be over.
If PCP cannot compete with +Natural and Crow within 6 months,
That is not really a surprise.
Back when we quit writing Tanto...
So please let us end Tanto!
I kept quiet about it because I did not want to pressure you.
But at this rate if we do not do something, it will be cancelled.
And Fukuda-san and the others have a new series starting.
We are not just competing with Eiji and Iwase now.
Now there are three new series.
From what he said, that is how it looks.
Are not those conditions a little unfair?
That means if I try my hardest, Takagi-kun will...!
Is not that what you wanted?
Did not you want to beat PCP?
Do you enjoy competing with Takagi-kun?
But it is important for Takagi-kun to be there so I can beat him!
Well... at this rate we will not have to worry about them pulling ahead.
Then I guess that is it for Ashirogi-sensei.
I do not think they can beat me like this.
When it comes to manga, Niizuma-kun's always right.
And Niizuma-san said at this rate...
Call Takagi-kun and then give me the phone!
We will not make it at this rate,
We need to find something to boost our potential.
At one point I had planned to kick you guys out no matter what it took.
But I am done with that cowardly plan.
From now on I am going to fight fair and square.
You guys will not be able to beat me.
W-wait a sec, I do not even know what you are talking about...
Apparently Niizuma-san said at this rate you PCP does not have a chance against him.
Now that I have told you this,
If you lose to me, it is your own fault, got it?!
I would like to see you try.
I do not care what you say, Yoshida-shi!
Then, what if I said a break means no tea party with Aoki-san?
Yoshida-shi, why will it be here?
Is not that why you have such a cool place?
And you will work hard after the tea party?
And after this, you will not take any more breaks from Otters?
That will keep him for another six months!
So he does not think PCP can win at this rate?
PCP could beat him if we made some changes.
If Niizuma-kun said that, it means you are almost there.
Oh hey, you said PCP did best with the under 10 and over 18 brackets right?
I think younger kids admire the characters,
And adults can see their younger selves in them.
But middle and high schoolers are going to be a little more distant.
So should we make the party's actions wilder?
You could, but you want to keep it realistic...
It has to be fairly ordinary.
This is not a battle manga, so there is a limit to what we can do.
There must be something that our manga lacks.
Once we fix that, we should be able to prove Niizuma-san wrong.
That is what I was thinking.
Dammit, what did Eiji have in mind?
I will study some more popular manga.
Mashiro-san, we are running out of 62 gradation tone.
We are following your instructions here, so you should know how much we have used.
As someone with design school experience, I think you rely on tones a little too much.
If you overuse them, it can end up flattening things out.
It is dangerous for a young woman to be alone with a guy in his apartment.
Remeber when you said that PCP cannot beat us at this rate...
I have been thinking about that.
PCP' s too plain right now.
It is not flashy like a battle manga.
It is not the story, it is the art.
Do not you think PCP' s art is a little too dark?
I mean, that is part of it.
But it is not very shonen manga-ish.
But the story's a little different, too.
That is what makes it unique right?
A shonen manga should not be this dark...
In order for this to become a popular manga...
I will need to change my style to suit the taste of our audience.
PCP is realistic, so the drawings should be realistic, too.
But it is a manga after all.
Realistic drawings are not good enough.
I have to do things you can only do with manga.
You have to be artistic every once in a while.
I did not come here to ask what Ashirogi Muto is missing.
I came here to make sure you do not tell them.
You are soft on them for some reason.
That is because I am a fan.
I told them you do not think they can beat us at this rate.
But I do not want to give them any more help than that.
I do not want to lose, either.
Let us make +Natural even more popular!
You are talented, we can do it!
I do not need to be a college student anymore.
I just want more time to work on my art.
I have already talked to my parents and emailed Azuki.
More time for our series I suppose.
Saiko, you said you would change your style gradually
I can already see a big difference in chapter 8.
Chapters 5 and 6 were in 7th and 8th place respectively...
If it gets any worse, Niizuma's warning...
Will the art in chapter 8 make enough of a difference?
So it was the art and not the story after all...
It is still trial and error, but if I keep this up...
The general concensus in the editorial department is that PCP' s ranking this week was just a fluke.
Then you are not looking at PCP closely enough.
At this rate, it will beat both +Natural...
Ashirogi-sensei is changing his drawing style.
It is even better in the preview copy of chapter 9.
So that is why you drew something different from what we discussed?
Yeah, I changed it after seeing that page in chapter 8 of PCP.
But do not you think that will make it worse...?
But Ashirogi-sensei might close the gap after seeing that manuscript.
I am here by myself today.
Could she be going after Niizuma-kun now?
You are really working hard on Crow, are not you?
Do you think +Natural will be ok?
I mean, will it do better than PCP?
I think the next chapter of PCP will beat it in the early results.
So I think we will put up a good fight in the final results.
Ashirogi-sensei is changing his style bit by bit starting with chapter 8.
So this page will make Crow even better than PCP!!
This is bad... PCP pulled ahead in the early results.
Even with the color pages to celebrate the anime.
PCP is in 4th, and +Natural is close behind.
Yeah, this will get the kids' votes for sure.
Azuki could have been in this...
I have to get PCP an anime for her sake...
Let us make +Natural even more popular!
You are talented, we can do it!
As I thought, this country's food is delicious!
I recommend this pack of clams!
Buy now and get this limited edition Otters gift!
Just seeing one is a treat!
I usually drink Darjeeling, so I am not a very good judge of Earl Grey...
Y-Yoshida-shi, please join me in the other room.
Is not the citrus flavor of Earl Grey wonderful?
I drink it from time to time.
Is not the flavor of muscatel delightful?
muscatel is the musky spice flavor in Darjeeling tea.
Niizuma-kun, here is next week's issue of Jack.
But you really should do what we agree on...
When the anime started, it passed PCP.
Yes, It was just as I thought.
Has she been coming over often?
Almost every night after my assistants go home.
Niizuma-kun, I know you are both adults.
And I do not mean to sound coarse but take it easy, okay?
Besides, I am an eternal boy.
That is why I write shonen manga.
You are her editor, try to take this more seriously!
Niizuma-san, did you tell them I was trying to persuade you?
I did not say a word.
Here is the issue with chapter 10 of PCP.
By the way, take a look at Crow.
He is telling the story through pictures...
Apparently he redid this as soon as he saw chapter 8 of PCP.
He must have noticed that I am changing my style...
Look what I can do with just pictures...
I feel like that is what he is saying...
But readers might find something lacking without the text and it might get fewer votes.
He wanted to show me this even if it meant losing popularity...
The new Crow got even more votes than usual?
But Niizuma was able to make readers find it novel and impressive.
Niizuma's above me in both talent and votes...
But +Natural is not doing as well as I thought it would.
It is in 4th again this week, but only 9 votes more than PCP' s 5th.
Starting next week there will be three new series.
PCP' s 15th chapter will get the cover and color pages.
This is our chance to fight!
We have to make our manga amazing for issue 26!
I will start working on the color pages now!
The two of them as a couple... that is tough to buy.
So you want us to stop them?
Honestly, it seems like Akina-kun pressured him into it.
But Niizuma-kun seemed pretty sure about it afterward.
Takahama-san's new series is pretty interesting.
Yeah, the courtroom battle idea really works as a shonen manga.
Takahama-san's representation of a courtroom is great!
Ally of Justice started in first place.
But the second chapter really dropped.
We really took it up a notch.
With all these new serializations, NANDE!?
The wording at the end has the same feeling as +Natural.
Fukuda-san and Takahama-san really have a chance.
Well, with all these new series starting up...
Whatever you think, there is only one thing to do.
That is right, we have to do it.
We will make the best manuscript yet!
When I struggle toward my dream
Those are the moments I love the most
I can feel our bond and will to fight
Our views overlap and electrify us
Let us improve ourselves, become what we should be
You can see the future in our path
My comrades do not agree with me
I cannot let it go, I will follow my heart from now on
There is no other choice, this is what I love and this is what I will do
I do not know what tomorrow will bring
But I know once again (just to get by),
I know you are working hard, but is PCP ok?
Do not worry, Ashirogi-kun is always exceeding expectations.
Think of a way to fulfill the dream.
